title: Disconnecting
body: Just played a ranked match, and got some weird lag (I never lag so this isn't just a moan about lagging). i kept getting the attempting to reconnect on and off, i checked all my other games and apps and the internet was all fine, so its not on my end. Anyone else getting this?

replies.body:
Bump.

I've had this two days in a row. Out of nowhere I got disconnected, then for 5-10 minutes it would say "reconnecting" and I'd briefly get into the game for perhaps two seconds then disconnect again.

After giving in exiting the game to try and reload, I get to the loading splash screen and get to 100%, to which I get a message box saying;

Network Warning
     You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again.

Now, I know my internet connection is 100% fine here, because not once through either of these games did I lag, or have any issue with ping or download speed.

Both times I am unable to get back into the game, even after resetting router, computer, and relogging.

Provider is iiNet. Some feedback from Riot on this would be appreciated, as I'm sure I'm not the only one this is happening to, and perhaps people are not speaking up about it and putting it down to their own possible connections before looking to the forums.
Hey OctopusPrime - what ISP are you with?  Is the issue still happening?
I am with vodafone, and no it has no happened again yet
